title: Coffee Shop and Plantation E-Commerce Website
short: Sarponesia is a web-based platform that digitalizes coffee business management for efficient, secure, and integrated operations.
long: Sarponesia project is designed as a web-based information system aimed at supporting the management and digitalization of Indonesiaâ€™s coffee business processes. The main goal of this project is to provide an integrated platform for administrators to manage products, services, articles, orders, and partnerships, while delivering an efficient user experience in purchasing and product reviewing. With structured management features such as product pages, service listings, articles, order processing, checkout, and reviews, the system seeks to enhance administrative efficiency, expand marketing reach, and foster direct interaction between service providers and customers. Overall, Sarponesia is developed to support the digital transformation of coffee-related MSMEs through a user-friendly, secure, and integrated approach.
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing with Stripe
Optimizing database queries for product search
Creating responsive design for mobile shopping experience
solutions: Used Stripe's secure payment APIs with webhook validation
Implemented MongoDB indexing and aggregation pipelines
Applied mobile-first design principles with Tailwind CSS

title: Automated Penetration System
short: A comprehensive automated penetration testing platform with real-time vulnerability scanning and detailed security reporting.
long: An advanced automated penetration testing system built with React and Node.js, designed for cybersecurity professionals. Features include automated vulnerability scanning, real-time threat detection, comprehensive security reporting, and integration with popular security frameworks. The system provides detailed penetration test reports, vulnerability assessments, and security recommendations with an intuitive dashboard for monitoring security posture.
challenges: Integrating multiple security tools and frameworks
Creating intuitive interface for complex security data
Ensuring system security while performing penetration tests
solutions: Developed unified API layer for seamless tool integration
Implemented progressive data visualization with interactive charts
Applied containerization and secure coding practices throughout

title: Ticket Booking Application
short: A comprehensive Android ticket booking application built with Kotlin for movies, events, and transportation.
long: A native Android application developed using Kotlin that provides a seamless ticket booking experience for movies, concerts, events, and transportation. The app features user authentication, seat selection with interactive UI, secure payment integration, QR code ticket generation, and real-time booking status. Built with modern Android architecture components including MVVM pattern, Room database, and Retrofit for API communication. The application supports offline ticket storage and push notifications for booking confirmations and reminders.
challenges: Implementing real-time seat selection with multiple users
Integrating secure payment gateways for mobile platform
Creating responsive UI for various Android screen sizes
Managing offline ticket storage and synchronization
solutions: Used Firebase Realtime Database for concurrent seat booking
Integrated multiple payment providers with secure tokenization
Implemented responsive layouts with ConstraintLayout and Material Design
Built robust offline-first architecture with Room and WorkManager
